front.title: Overview and Framework for Internationalized Email

abstract.t: Full use of electronic mail throughout the world requires that peoplebe able to use their own names, written correctly in their ownlanguages and scripts, as mailbox names in email addresses. Thisdocument introduces a series of specifications and operationalsuggestions that define mechanisms and protocol extensions needed tofully support internationalized email addresses. These changesinclude an SMTP extension and extension of email header syntax toaccommodate UTF-8 data. The document set also will includediscussion of key assumptions and issues in deploying fullyinternationalized email.
